channel.title: [HELP] my client java problem
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with my client error please ? everytime i click 'run' an error appear on the command screen . :(
here is the error -----
Sk1ttlezrule43v Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Press any key to continue . . .
this is the client -------
@ECHO OFF TITLE Sk1ttlezrule43v Client color 09 echo Sk1ttlezrule43v JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE

item.title: [HELP] my client java problem
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

No, he means your JRE!
Check If “public static void main(String args[])” is in EGUI.java. If its no then find out your main class and load it. Possibly Client.class

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] my client java problem

item.description:
@lorddeathzx wrote:

Can anyone help me with my client error please ? everytime i click ‘run’ an error appear on the command screen .

here is the error -----

Sk1ttlezrule43v
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)

color 09

JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
